definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: Now, only the light of one small hobbit's faith can save the world.
sentences.chinese: 现在只有一个小霍比特人的信仰之光能拯救世界了。

sentences.english: This bounced light is what allows V-Ray to create high-quality renderings.
sentences.chinese: 反弹光线简单地说就是从一个表面反弹的光能。

sentences.english: I recommend you and Cosmic people Light powers too, to destroy this kind of literature.
sentences.chinese: 我建议你和光能的宇宙人也销毁这种著作。

sentences.english: In particular, thin cells fail to capture much light at the red end of the spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 具体来说，薄型电池不能捕获多少红光的光能。

sentences.english: "Yingli is a more established version of Trina, " one observer notes.
sentences.chinese: 天威英利是天合光能的更高级的版本。

sentences.english: Its shares are down 37% since April 15.
sentences.chinese: 自4月15日以来，天合光能的股票已下跌37%。

sentences.english: And it is given off in the form of a photon.
sentences.chinese: 它一个光能的形式释放。

sentences.english: The light energy transfer among phycobiliproteins in phycobilisomes has been discussed.
sentences.chinese: 对藻胆体内藻胆蛋白之间的光能传递进行了讨论。

sentences.english: This thing is not going to touch it.
sentences.chinese: 所以光能并不会对价电子能有影响。

sentences.english: A new light conversion agriculture film was prepared.
sentences.chinese: 研制出既转紫光又转绿光的新型高光能农膜。

sentences.english: A method of curing powder using direct exposure to light energy.
sentences.chinese: 直接暴露在光能下而固化粉末涂料的一种方法。

sentences.english: It seems that light energy will be an important subject of scientific research in the future.
sentences.chinese: 看来，在未来的年代里，光能是科学研究的重要课题。

sentences.english: So what happens? It goes through.
sentences.chinese: 所以呢，光能就能通过晶体。

sentences.english: The results of agriculture test for applying light conversion technology to films are reported.
sentences.chinese: 报道了光能转换技术在农用棚膜中的应用试验结果。

sentences.english: Relationship between the energy of single microparticle and its diameter was analysed in the article.
sentences.chinese: 分析了单个微粒的光能和粒径之间的关系。

sentences.english: As a result, only the light from behind the objects can be seen.
sentences.chinese: 结果，只有那些从该材料背后传来的光能被看见。
